title: November 8, 2010 3PM
content:
Conversation with Remarkable Minds Peter Kingsley: one of the true radical spiritual philosophers & visionaries,... <!--more--> will share his most recent research spanning several continents showing Greek philosophy’s indebtedness to the ancient cultures of Mongolia.
 “A Story Waiting to Pierce You: Mongolia, Tibet and the Destiny of the Western World” offers a breathtaking insight into our past and our future as human beings; it traces the ancient threads that connect Mongolia, Tibet & Native Americans to the very origins of western civilization, showing how these sacred ties have shaped our lives today.
